patterns: Eligibility for Pharmaceutical Science M.Pharm.

Pharmaceutical Science M.Pharm. eligibility criteria
responses: Pharmaceutical Science (M.Pharm.): B.Pharm. with 55% or equivalent CGPA and valid GPAT/GATE Qualified Score. Registration with State Pharmacy Council: Candidates seeking admission to this programme should be graduate in B. Pharm.course with 55% or equivalent CGPA and valid GPAT/GATE score. Relaxation of 5% marks in the qualifying examination will be given to the candidates belonging to SC/ST/PWD categories. The candidates should have registration with respective State Pharmacy Council or should obtain the same within 2 months from the date of admission failing to which the admission shall stand automatically cancelled.

patterns: Is there any relaxation for SC/ST students at Dr. Harisingh Gour University?
What are the benefits for SC/ST students at DHSGSU?
Does DHSGSU offer any relaxation for scheduled caste and scheduled tribe students?
Are there any special provisions for SC/ST students at Dr. Harisingh Gour University?
What relaxations are available for SC/ST students at DHSGSU?
responses: Dr. Harisingh Gour University is a central university that follows the guidelines laid by the government. Therefore, the central university has relaxations for scheduled caste and scheduled tribe students. SC and ST students can benefit from a 5% relaxation in the eligibility criteria. Moreover, the central university gives 3-5 years of age relaxation for SC/ST students. Additionally, students from the physically disabled community or OBC have numerous age and admissions relaxations.

patterns: What is the NIRF ranking of Dr. Harisingh Gour University?
How is DHSGSU ranked by NIRF?
What is the overall NIRF ranking of Dr. Harisingh Gour University?
Where does DHSGSU stand in NIRF rankings?
What was the NIRF ranking of Dr. Harisingh Gour University in 2020?
responses: Dr. Harisingh Gour University was ranked in the 151-200 range out of 200 colleges in India in the overall category by NIRF in 2020.

patterns: What is Dr. Harisingh Gour University famous for?
What courses is DHSGSU known for?
What are the flagship programs of Dr. Harisingh Gour University?
Why is Dr. Harisingh Gour University well-known?
What makes DHSGSU popular?
responses: Dr. Harisingh Gour University is famous for its law courses and pharmaceutical sciences courses. The university offers great faculty members and student amenities. The course fee for the flagship courses is also respectable for the popularity of the courses. An aspirant must appear for CUET UG and CUET PG exams in order to secure admission in the flagship courses.
